Uses of Class
evs.metric.parameters.DoubleProcedureParameter

Packages that use DoubleProcedureParameter
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
evs.metric.parameters Parameters of the verification metrics. 
evs.metric.results Storage of results from the verification metrics.

          Returns an equivalent parameter defined for real-values (using the specified climate CDF to determine probabilities) if the current parameter is defined for probabilities.
